name: Hooded Ghawazee Tunic MAGENTA PAISLEY
description:
Extremely Limited Edition Fab! 
Only 1 available. The one shown in pics is a size L/XL, and is available in stock and ready-to-ship.  

    Slinky stretch knit fabric with beautiful paisley designs in magenta, purple, and black. Fabric is interwoven with super sparkly lurex threads. So pretty! Our hooded ghawazee tunics feature an oversized lined hood, draped ghawazee sleeves, side vents, and adjustable ties in front. You can tie in front or back, tie in a bow, or cross over like a wrap. You will find many ways to layer and style this versatile piece.  

LAST PHOTO SHOWS GARMENT DETAILS
 
Elevate your Style in Urban Gypsy Apparel. Comfortably sexy clothing to live, lounge, and love in. Wear anywhere versatility; lounging, yoga, dancing, hooping, working out, or rockin it!
 
 
Sizing: 
S/M 15-16" shoulders, 34-40" bust, 10-12" upper arms.

L/XL 16-17" shoulders, 36-44" bust,  12-14" upper arms.

*other items shown sold separately.

name: Fingerless Fishnet Lace Gloves in Nude or Black
description:
Beautiful fishnet lace fingerless gloves.
High quality lace- you can see the difference.
Soft-stretchy-comfy.
Available in Nude or Black. One size fits all.

name: 25 yard Reversible Cotton Gypsy Skirt
description:
The original reversible Gypsy skirt!
Our fluffy 25yd Gypsy skirts are completely reversible, providing you with twice the options and double the pleasure. Hypnotic swirls of vibrant color and black cotton intertwine as you dance creating magnificent skirt flourishes and swirls. Our reversible skirts are well known as the "crème de la crème" of Gypsy skirts. Yummy. Super soft, lightweight and manageable. 

Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. 
Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.
Available in 32-34-36-38-40" length.
Elastic waistband comfortably stretches to fit 34-54".
Please include measurements on paypal invoice.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

name: Tribal Banjara Mirror Fringe Belt
description:
Our decadent Tribal mirror fringe belts are generously decorated with hand beaded hip medallions, chain trim, cowrie shells, and soldered silver coin pendants. Multiple rows of Banjara style embroidery are highlighted with reflective mirrored discs. And as if that wasn't enough, we add a generous amount of the highest quality mohair wool fringe and top it all off with long cowrie shell tassels. Yes!

Belt consists of two separate panels that provide a perfect fit due to adjustable ties at each hip. You may request different widths for each panel. 

Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.

name: Fishnet Crochet Shrug Top
description:
Our popular crochet knit shrug tops are the perfect accessory to update your current wardrobe. Genuine cotton crochet. The perfect top for those looking for a little extra arm coverage. Very flattering on women of all sizes!

 
Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is 6-8 weeks.

name: Tribal Mirror Coin Bra
description:
Our decadent Tribal Mirror Bras are generously decorated with Banjara style embroidery, hand soldered silver coin pendants, chain trim, cowrie tassel, and a triple chain drape. Multiple rows of Banjara style embroidery are highlighted with reflective mirrored discs. 

Luxurious velvet bra base has padded cups and our sleek and stylish criss-cross straps that offer excellent support. Weight is evenly distributed across your back to omit strain on your neck and shoulders. Professionally constructed to provide the best of comfort and durability.

 Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.

Available in A-B-C-D

name: Deluxe Velvet Gypsy Skirt
description:
Our most decadent Gypsy skirt combines the best of everything. This gorgeous 25yd skirt consists of six full tiers of burnt velvet, velour, cotton and satin. Rich layers of fabric intertwine as you dance creating magnificent skirt flourishes and swirls. Super fluffy & flight worthy. Simply divine! Can be made in one solid color or choose different colors for each tier. The possibilities are endless.

*Burnt velvet patterns vary according to availability.

Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above. 

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks. 
Can also be made in two-tones or multi colors upon request.

name: Reversible Velvet Gypsy Ghawazee Top
description:
Our Gypsy Ghawazee sleeve tops are completely reversible...providing you with twice the options and double the pleasure. One side is soft burnt velvet and the other can be made in your choice of cotton or satin. Adjustable tie top has long draped sleeves with sexy slit shoulders. A beautiful and versatile blouse...you can wear this tied in front, under your bra like a vest, or tie in back and wear as a shrug.

*Burnt velvet patterns vary according to availability.

Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above. SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

description:

name: Deluxe Tribal Gypsy Tassel Fringe Belt
description:
One of our most popular Tribal belts. Our deluxe tassel belts are generously decorated with hand soldered silver medallions, glass beaded trim, metal zardosi lace, nail heads, dangles, and draped chains. Rich black velvet belt base is accentuated with vibrant silk satin trim. Adjustable corset lacing provides the best possible fit. And as if that wasn't enough, we add a generous amount of the highest quality mohair wool fringe and top it all off with extra fluffy tassels that adorn each hip. Yes!

name: Tribal Banjara Mirror Crochet Back Tassel Belt
description:
Our elaborate crochet mirror belts are generously decorated with colorful embroidery, chain trim, metallic sequins, hand soldered silver coin medallions, and cowrie shell tassels. Multiple rows of Banjara style embroidery are highlighted with reflective mirrored discs. Absolutely G-o-r-g-e-o-u-s!

The back view is the main attraction, consisting of a dramatic cotton crochet knit skirt with a long flowing train of genuine mohair wool fringe. Silver metal chains and coin pendants drape across the hips. A beautiful cowrie shell flower is placed at center. Authentic cowrie shell tassels frame the skirt for added movement and style.

The front of the belt consists of a black velvet base that is beautifully decorated with sequin floral appliques, metal beads, chain trim, glass beads, and hand soldered silver coin medallions.

Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.

name: Tribal Pantaloons 4yd Gypsy Harem Pants
description:
Our full cut harem pants have inset side panels that provide a sleek and stylish fit. Super soft and comfy. Our exclusive pattern provides full cut legs, while omitting extra bulk at the hips. Elastic waistband and cuffs allow for ease of movement during practice or performance. Simply luxurious!

*Choice of satin, cotton or burnt velvet. Burnt velvet pattern varies according to availability.

Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.
Include fabric choice with payment.

name: Tribal Gypsy Wide Flare Tier Leg Pants
description:
Our popular tiered leg pants have all the great details of a classic Gypsy skirt with the ease and comfort of pants. We use over 3yds per leg to create these incredible 50" wide bell bottoms. Super soft and comfy with an adjustable fold over lycra waistband. Due to fold over waistband, you can choose just how high or low you want to go. HOT!

Available in gauzy cotton, or rayon jersey w/ lace overlay. ( both have cotton lycra waistbands)
Please specify choice on payment invoice.

 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.
Cotton lycra lining is available in 8 colors. Lace overlay can be in black or same color as lining upon request.

name: Tribal Gypsy Burnt Velvet Tiers Hipskirt
description:
Take your costuming to the next level with one of our gorgeous Gypsy hip skirts. This innovative design simply ties on like a hip scarf while providing the effect of a full tiered overskirt. Can be tied in front or to the side, and can go from class to performance with ease. Layer over pants or skirts for instant style. Our luxurious hip skirts are the perfect accent piece to any costume.

 
Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

SIZE GUIDE: http://www.scarletslounge.com/customOrders.html

Our current turnaround time is approximately 6-8 weeks.

name: Velvet Gypsy Halter Bra Top
description:
Our beautiful jeweled halter tops feature intricate hand beaded embroidery from India consisting of metallic zardosi designs and sparkling sequins. Details include soft cotton lined cups and our sleek and stylish criss-cross straps that evenly distribute weight across your back to omit strain on your neck and shoulders. Straps are accented by large brass metal beads. Simply slide the beads up or down to adjust the width of the cups to suit your size and style. 
 
Custom Order: 
This is a special "Custom Made" garment. Please check our Size Guide and include your measurements on the contact form provided in the store menu above.

name: Tribal Gypsy Cropped Velvet Chemise Top
description:
Our beautiful cropped chemise blouse features an elastic banded midriff and neckline. Top has a ruched front panel that can be drawn tied to cinch at bust. Super soft, lightweight and comfortable. You will reach for this top again and again!

name: Jeweled India Brocade Zardosi Fringe Belt
description:
Our decadent brocade fringe belts are beautifully embellished with metal zardosi designs, silver coin medallions, chain trim, and sparkling glass stones. Flowers, paisleys, and circular mandala designs are accented by an interesting variety of colorful glass beads, sequins, and crystals.This belt sparkles like jewels. And as if that wasn't enough, we add a generous amount of the highest quality mohair wool fringe and braided wool ties.

name: Beaded Lace Boudoir Halter top
description:
Gorgeous hand beaded halter top with antique silver o-ring detail and black lace ties. Sparkling sequins and glass beads. Lined in cotton for added comfort and absorbency. Sparkles like jewels. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in India exclusively for Scarlet's Lounge.

 Entire base is constructed of premium  4-way stretch cotton lycra, with 10% lycra.  Lot's of support to enhance your figure. Top layer consists of black Spanish lace. Super soft & stretchy. Sexy "X" back straps enhance your shoulders, and evenly distributes weight across your back to omit neck strain.
  

ORDER INFO: 
Choose bust size from drop down menu and include color choice, underbust measurements, and any additional info on paypal invoice at checkout.

8 colors to choose from- see color chart.

name: Backless Burnt Velvet Boudoir Vest
description:
Gorgeous burnt velvet backless vest with black lace trim. Lined in cotton for added comfort and absorbency. Designed to accentuate our lace boudoir halter top, as shown in photos. The perfect little layering piece for cholis, bras, halter tops.

name: Multi-tier Boudoir Hipskirt Cotton, Burnt Velvet, Lace
description:
6 delicious layers of fabric in this order from top to bottom: Burnt velvet, cotton gauze, lace, burnt velvet, cotton gauze, lace. Antique silver o-ring detail. 25" lace ties for size adjustments. Tie to the front or side as shown. Lot's of lush, but amazingly lightweight and floaty.

Can be made in solid or multiple colors, including tie-dye, upon request.

(hands not included) ;)

name: Tribal Gypsy Fishtail Flare Pants Multi-tier Lace w/ Stripes
description:
Multi-tier tier flare pants with a whimsical two-tone striped underlayer. Tuck lace overlay in at hips and/or to the side to create different styles as shown. Top layer consists of multiple tiers of black lace and bottom layer consists of soft rayon jersey.

Entire base is constructed of premium  4-way stretch cotton lycra foe excellent support. These pants move with you and hug your curves in all the right places. Lot's of support to enhance your figure.  

 Super soft and comfy, with an adjustable fold over lycra waistband. Due to fold over waistband, you can choose just how high or low you want to go!

*Can also be made with solid color lining upon request.

 ♥COMFORT-&-STYLE♥

Hollywood Tribal Bra~
Simply D-e-l-i-c-i-o-u-s! Handcrafted with glass beadwork, metal studs, metal beads, rhinestones, antique Kuchi Coins & chain fringe. It has everything a girl could possibly hope for and more. name: Vintage Turkoman Tribal Body Chain
description:

This incredible Turkoman body chain is dripping in vintage Turkoman pendants and arrowhead dangles. The ultimate Tribal ensemble. A unique piece of wearable art that you will surely treasure.

name: SOLAR FLARES~ Black Assuit Lace
description:
Elevate your Style in Urban Gypsy Apparel. Comfortably sexy clothing to live, lounge, and love in. Wear anywhere versatility; lounging, yoga, dancing, hooping, working out, or rockin it!

Super comfy, 4-way stretch cotton lycra, with sheer lace overlay. Two separate layers for added movement. Lace is cut in an interesting geometric tribal design that resembles Egyptian assuit.

It's all in the fine details: Double layers, finished edges, silver grommets, drawstring ties at hip. Wear anywhere!

In stock and ready to ship. Other items shown sold separately.

Sizing: . 
S/6-8 fits 36-38" hips.

M/10-12 fits 40-42" hips.

L/14-16 fits 44-46" hips.

XL/18-20 fits 48-50" hips.
